name: Lear Dinosaur Jurrasic, Kids Flashcards Game
name_original: Lear Dinosaur Jurrasic, Kids Flashcards Game
description:
The most exciting journey to prehistoric times when dinosaur were walking on earth and nature was untouched by civilianization. Amazing game, with dinosaur flash cards you can learn a lot of about dinosaur, what they name was, and how they bread in ancient world. So if you want to learn dinosaur and have fun these predators flash cards will help you. Education game with different dinosaur names and sounds, to learn about dinosaur press button and you'll see full picture, who play dinosaur sound - it feel like real Jurassic park. Her you meet different types of dinosaurs and understand their classification: carnivore, herbivore, omnivore.

It will be ease to discover all kind of dinosaur in flesh, just by playing awesome dinosaur flashcard game in your smartphone. Game is great tool for kids learn quick, because here are dinosaur images with sounds, just by pressing on the image of the dinosaur you see full picture and hear it sounds. All children's ( boys and girls) are able to learn quick about the extinct dinosaur from world of Jurassic dinosaurs. So this is best way to take them on a journey through the dinosaur land and the different dinosaur kinds, species from the biggest dinosaur to the baby dinosaur.

Features of the Dinosaur Flash Card:
- Tap on train your brain with dinosaur
- Dinosaurs game for younger kids
- All dinosaur world Dinos in one game even Trex
- Action cards helps for boys and girls learn dinosaurs fight
- Dinosaur history museum
- Jurassic world and dinosaur toy fact

This game will help you learn about the raptors, dragons other species of dinosaurs that ever walked on our home land, earth. Lots of cool pictures with: spinosaurus, stegosaurus, brontosaurus, ceratosaurus, acrosaurus, tyrannosaurus, torturous, allosaurus - they look like real. Learn paleontology with our cards it very simple, just test and improve knowledge of your kids with the dinosaur world flash cards.
